rooms.description: Dual car garage with ample storage space.
Scandinavian style living area featuring open plan design and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Modern kitchen integrated with the living area in a Scandinavian style.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the living and kitchen areas.
Mud room with storage for shoes and outdoor gear, includes a small wash area.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window providing abundant natural light.
Double door entrance from the garage to the main house.
Sliding door for seamless connectivity between living area and kitchen.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with a private balcony facing east for Vastu compliance.
ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom.

openings.description: Balcony window offering natural light and cross ventilation.
Sliding door between master bedroom and ensuite bathroom.
